data.name: Faulty Apprentice: Palm Tree Paradise (4th DLC)
data.detailed_description:
STORY

Are you tired of the summer heat? Do you need a vacation?
What if you could visit a tropical island accompanied by three beautiful women?

Faulty Apprentice Fourth DLC-- Palm Tree Paradise!

This DLC update takes place after the GOOD ENDING in the Base game/Main Story. You will also need a save data from Day 20.
This DLC contains full body nudity, erotic dialogue, and consensual sexual act.

MAIN FEATURES

    • New Illustrations!- If that isn't enough to get you hyped, there are 3 intimate scenes, one for each of the instructors <3
    • Sexual Content!- You can now engage in an intimate moment with the Stars Reach Instructors (if you are lovers in the base game), all the way. No more black screen!
    • Fully Voiced! - This DLC features a full English voice-over from the beginning till the end!

    JOIN THE COMMUNITY

    Join the conversation here or Faulty Apprentice official Discord community, and let the AGL studios team know what you think of the game. We read all of the player's feedback!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Faulty Apprentice: Palm Tree Paradise (4th DLC)

subs.option_text: Faulty Apprentice - Palm Tree Paradise (4th DLC) - 59₴

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted in this game are over the age of 18 and older.

This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
